segments.text: I notice the water is really making a mess, overflowing from the sink and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so sneaky, taking cookies while she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall off that stool, it looks so unstable and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the puddle before she slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, he's stretching so far and balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but maybe I should just watch what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, but also kind of funny and entertaining.
segments.speaker: PAR
